body.name: Seat Cushion for Office Chair – Memory Foam Tailbone Pillow Pad for Sitting, Computer, Desk, Chair, Car – Contoured Posture Corrector for Sciatica, Coccyx Back Pain Relief (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SIT MORE COMFORTABLY: If you spend more than 8 hours a day sitting, then this seat pillow is the perfect choice for you. The contoured surface and U shape design of the car seat cushion evenly distributes the weight of your body, offloading the pressure and promotes healthy spine alignment.

MAKE EVERY CHAIR COMFORTABLE: This orthopedic seat cushion nicely fits in most of the chairs. Take it with you in your car, plane, train, office, or anywhere you have to seat for a long time. The handle on the sides allows for convenient carrying. Great for travelers, office going individuals and pregnant women.

MICRODOT NON SKID BACKING: The back of this seat cushion has skid-resistant microdots which ensures that it does not shift, move or slip. The non-slip technology offers perfect placement on any type of chair, be it sofas, wheelchair, office chair, train chair.

HEALTHY & DURABLE MEMORY FOAM: This seat cushion is made with 100% pure and premium quality memory foam that contains no additives or harmful chemicals. The memory foam is soft and enough to conform to individual body shape yet sturdy enough to never go flat. Additionally, the cushion is climate-friendly, making it an eco-conscious choice for your driving comfort needs.

STYLISH & EASY TO CARE COVER: Don’t worry about your cushion getting soiled or dirty. The removable zipper cover is machine washable, which allows for hassle-free cleanup. And not to forget, the fashionable style keeps décor up-to-date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I’ve found
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion was very great after my back surgery. It was soft, but firm and was helpful lifting me up from my chair and sofa. I’ve tried other brands, but this was the most helpful! Price was reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable! I needed comfortable seating at local sports games and this did wonders! Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but just know that the back tends to spread out
reviews.reviewText: After almost two weeks of daily 8-hour use (with frequent breaks):Pros: The comfort of this seat is superb. I bought it to augment the failing padding of a 10-year-old cheap office chair, and it accomplishes that goal quite well. The memory foam is resilient and comes completely back up after a quick break. The soft padding is comfortable and I like how it is removable for washing. I do think that it has improved my posture tremendously.Cons: However, the memory foam compresses about 50% after about an hour of use. Of course memory foam is expected to compress, but this seems like a lot to me. In addition, the two back "arms" of the seat tend to flare out to the sides after compressing, which results in a wider tailbone hole than usual and causes a loss of support for a small person. I had to resort to tying a rope around mine to try and keep it together. I wish the manufacturer had sewn that handle across the tailbone cutout instead of on the side to keep it together.Verdict: I would buy it again. One million times better than my old threadbare chair and a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what my tush needed
reviews.reviewText: This item is very durable, affordable, with fast shipping, The item definitely serves it's purpose of keeping my sciatic nerve pain very minimal while sitting down during work hours. I actually bought a 2nd one just for home and/or on the go comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not so awesome
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised when I got this today for several reasons:One-there was no sort of indication of the company selling this pillow: No “please buy our stuff” or any directions-not saying they need them but I seriously thought there would be something in the package. That was weird.Two-there’s no emblem on the pillow like shown in the advertisement pictures. This is my own fault because I didn’t look at any of the picture reviews. If I had, I would have saw that others have a plain black pillow cushion. However, I don’t get why they have all the pictures of the product having a dark green emblem but don’t send that product. Again: my mistake. Weird still.and for the most disappointing:Three-It’s not awesome. I have recently started having serious coccyx, hip, and low back pain and sitting in our wooden chairs for more than 30 minutes was TORTURE for me. It would essential leave me stuck in the sitting position for about 10 seconds while waiting for my pain and stiffness to let up. I used a regular chair cushion, but it didn’t really help. I chose this cushion because it wasn’t too expensive and because the reviews were decent. This morning I saw it was on the way to me and I was thrilled that my butt hurt so I could test it out!!! My heart was as deflated as this pillow becomes after my sitting on it. It shifts all over the chair in spite of the grippers on the bottom of the cushion. It isn’t long enough to cover from front to the edge of the seat. It isn’t the actual size of a seat. It’s just like a little neck pillow of some kind but for the booty…..that tells you how little your booty needs to be for this to be 5 stars. I noticed if I shift it closer to the back so it actually supports my big butt and hips, it feels like I have a wretched wedgie from what I assume is a seated posture trainer. It really isn’t comfortable for me at all.Good thing 1-3: It is price efficient for my broke, hurting arthritic butt. It didn’t smell weird. It’s light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it, it helps my hip and back a lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MUST BUY!!!! Tailbone Pain Relief: Embracing Comfort with the Memory Foam Tailbone Pillow Pad
reviews.reviewText: The Memory Foam Tailbone Pillow Pad has been a true savior for my tailbone issues. As someone who struggles with discomfort and pain in the tailbone region, this pillow pad has provided unparalleled relief. The memory foam conforms to the shape of my body, providing optimal support and cushioning for my tailbone. I love how portable and lightweight the pad is, allowing me to use it on various seating surfaces, whether at home, the office, or in the car. This pillow pad has made a remarkable difference in my daily life, allowing me to sit pain-free and focus on my tasks without distraction. If you're dealing with tailbone issues and seeking a solution that truly works, the Memory Foam Tailbone Pillow Pad is a must-have accessory for instant relief and enhanced comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of sitting at work (receptionist duties, yay), but the office chair that was already there when I started is not supportive. I struggle with sciatic nerve pain, so it's important to me to have good sitting posture, and I was hoping this cushion would help. It does help. I wouldn't say it's incredible or that it's "cured" my pain, but it's definitely better than nothing. It is as advertised. I've only had it for a few weeks now, so I can't say whether it retains its shape over time, but so far it seems to be holding up.

Tuve problemas de espalda baja como por dos meses y no fue hasta que compré este cojín que realmente comencé a sentir mejora. Lo uso alrededor de 7 horas al día mientras trabajo. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Yo tengo un par de sillas duras de oficina que me dolían los huesos del trasero después de algunas horas sentado, gracias a este cojín, ya puedo trabajar más cómodamente sin dolor.
Después de 5 segundos no hay diferencia entre el suelo o este producto. Tal vez funcione para alguien que pesa menos de 60 kilos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es cómodo pero un poco suave la esponja
reviews.reviewText: Es un buen producto, pero tal vez seria mejor que fuera un poco mas rígida la esponja y es un poco calurosa la tela .
